en.name: Deck Master: "Kaiser Sea Horse"
en.effect: You can only use this Skill's first and second effects once per Duel.1: During your Main Phase, play 1 "Kaiser Sea Horse" from outside your Deck in face-down Defense Position. (Its battle position can be changed.)2: If you control "Kaiser Sea Horse", you can Normal Summon a LIGHT monster with 1 less Tribute this turn.
